channel.title: [Beta] Archyle; Economy Server
channel.description:
Website: [url=http://archyle.cu.cc/]Archyle Forums[/url] Client: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/smiq8dzwpo07hn9/Play Archyle.jar?dl=0]Play Archyle[/url]
Archyle. An economy server where every skill will have a purpose and be important. Armour, jewelry, food and everything else will be brought into the game by players killing, bossing, slaying or skilling. The server is brand new and currently in the beta stages, this means we're looking for any bugs in-game which needs to be sorted and taking in all suggestions from players on what they would like to see added in next. Community is very important and we want the gameplay to be enjoyable for you.
[b]Media...[/b] [spoiler] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/hN1OLfQ.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/CZtaLS6.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/axumnDj.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/01ct3e4.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/O7Ls54x.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/lavyoke.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/M7atY29.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/7F95iTM.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/50eFdTc.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/vM9NFES.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/OCtf6om.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/3nkfeNZ.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/CWtPaFJ.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/lsa6RDO.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ibc97HW.png[/img] [/b] [b][img]http://i.imgur.com/h9GOAfl.png[/img] [/b] [/spoiler]

item.title: [Beta] Archyle; Economy Server
item.dc:creator: @Archyle Archyle
item.description:
@Archyle wrote:

Strucker:

What about quests?

It can always be a possibility Suggestions are always welcome

item.title: [Beta] Archyle; Economy Server
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Soulcist:

I feel like these kinds of server are fine but the popularity of them (as far as people wanting to play them, and having a nice medium to large playerbase) is VERY low compared to when OS was REALLY popular.

As much as I want to disagree with this statement, it is correct. But since seeing SoulSplit, arguably the biggest server of all time, get taken down I think RSPS in general are not popular anymore. It is just the same cycle:

start server > Get a small playerbase > players leave > server ends

Read full topic

item.title: [Beta] Archyle; Economy Server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This looks fine but I swore you posted an advertisement for this thread a little while back, right? Also, I feel like these kinds of server are fine but the popularity of them (as far as people wanting to play them, and having a nice medium to large playerbase) is VERY low compared to when OS was REALLY popular.

Read full topic
